r.d: The extension is able to produce diffs of two XML documents and then to apply the difference to the source document. The diff is a XML document containing copy/insert/delete instruction nodes in human readable format. DOMDocument objects, local files and strings in memory can be processed.
r.n: - Fixed compilation under VS2008 and below - Fixed memory leaks and exception handling - Improved the m4 script, system wide libdiffmark will be used if available (Remi Collet) - General improvements (Remi Collet) - RPMs are now available from Remi's repository
